insert into sm_role (role_name, role_type, role_code, creator, creat_time, modifier, modify_time, is_sys_role) values (#{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifier,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isSysRole,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update sm_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_type = #{roleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=CHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=CHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, is_sys_role = #{isSysRole,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, role_name, role_type, role_code, creator, creat_time, modifier, modify_time, is_sys_role from sm_role
